name: Directionality
description:
Directionality is a fast paced easy to play reaction game with a minimalist typographical art style. 

Design and Programming By Oliver William Walker

Composition & Sound Design by Chloe Kwok - http://www.kwokworkmusic.com/

Directionality is the first project for January in my game a month journey for 2019. 

Unzip the files and run the excitable. 

Made with Unity.
